page.title: 18IRVINE * MARYMASS FAIR (2)
page.content:
On the morning of the fair,the Captain of the{Carter's {Society}and the rest of the Carters lead a procession through the streets of Irvine to the{Town House}where the {Marymass Queen}is crowned.
The Queen and her{four Maries arrive and the Captain of the Carters, escorts them up onto a platform which has been erected specially.A Burgh Officer reads out a short speech,then the Queen is crowned.The Queen and her four Maries then lead a procession to the Town Moor where more festivities begin.
